courseSectionInformation: May be repeated. Credit is given for spring term only. Open to all students who have been accepted by audition, with assignments made according to proficiency and instrumentation. Completion of each course involves, in addition to the regular schedule of rehearsals, participation in public performances by the band. Prerequisite: Band Division audition during early October, or consent of instructor.
description: Performs for home basketball games. May be repeated. Credit is given for spring term only. Open to all students who have been accepted by audition, with assignments made according to proficiency and instrumentation. Completion of each course involves, in addition to the regular schedule of rehearsals, participation in public performances by the band. Prerequisite: Band Division audition during early October, or consent of instructor.
label: Basketball Band
